reformed_query: adds getActivePage Viewer container IPresence connect effects connection account executed
bug_title: [presence][ui] xmpps accounts can appear twice in contacts list
bug_description: creating connection ( e.g . ) XMPPS provider first time , contacts list view yet shown , account ( e.g . slewis @ ecf.eclipse.org ) added twice ( MultiRosterView.addContainer called twice ) . connect ui opens view i.e . XMPPConnectWizard.performFinish ( block executed via Display.asyncExec ( ) ) private void openView ( ) { try { final MultiRosterView view = ( MultiRosterView ) workbench.getActiveWorkbenchWindow ( ) .getActivePage ( ) .showView ( MultiRosterView.VIEW_ID ) ; view.addContainer ( container ) ; } catch ( final PartInitException e ) { e.printStackTrace ( ) ; } } showView ( MultiRosterView.VIEW_ID ) called first time , triggers MultiRosterView.setupTreeViewer , calls MultiRosterView.retrieveServices ( ) . MRV.retrieveServices block looks IPresenceServices found adds associated container via MRV.addContainer : private void retrieveServices ( ) { IPresenceService [ ] services = Activator.getDefault ( ) .getPresenceServices ( ) ; ( int = ; < services.length ; i++ ) { IContainer container = ( IContainer ) services [ ] .getAdapter ( IContainer.class ) ; ( container ! = null & & container.getConnectedID ( ) ! = null ) { addContainer ( container ) ; } } } openView block run asynchronously , retrieveServices find newly connected container exposed IPresenceService ... immediately container connect notification ( xmpp provider ) . , view.addContainer ( container ) call * also * made ( via openView ( ) ) , container/account added twice . Remy think appropriate fix ? 's changing asyncExec syncExec ( can/does result deadlock ) . could ) removing retrieveServices ( ) ( would negative side effects ? ) ) Adding check addContainer prior existence given container adding already present ?

bug_description: Currently , zookeeper provider starts shuts , produces output standard ... example : ZooDiscovery > Discovery Service Activated . Feb , 3:53:38 PM . ... log4j : WARN appenders could found logger ( org.apache.zookeeper.server.ZooKeeperServer ) . log4j : WARN Please initialize log4j system properly . ZooDiscovery > Service Published : Feb , 3:53:42 PM . ServiceInfo [ uri=ecf.osgirsvc : //localhost:9278/osgirsvc_YFsonK7gMRipiNY7mhngPWce4X8= ; id=ServiceID [ type=ServiceTypeID [ typeName=_ecf.osgirsvc._default.default._iana ] ; location=ecf.osgirsvc : //localhost:9278/osgirsvc_YFsonK7gMRipiNY7mhngPWce4X8= ; full=_ecf.osgirsvc._default.default._iana @ ecf.osgirsvc : //localhost:9278/osgirsvc_YFsonK7gMRipiNY7mhngPWce4X8= ] ; priority=0 ; weight=0 ; props=ServiceProperties [ { endpoint.service.id=58 , endpoint.package.version.org.eclipse.ecf.examples.remoteservices.hello=3.0.0 , objectClass=org.eclipse.ecf.examples.remoteservices.hello.IHello , endpoint.framework.uuid=00c93b4b-ba3b-0010-1045-97c48d87b8f2 , remote.intents.supported=passByValue exactlyOnce ordered , ecf.endpoint.id.ns=ecf.namespace.r_osgi , remote.configs.supported=ecf.r_osgi.peer , endpoint.id=r-osgi : //localhost:9278 , service.imported.configs=ecf.r_osgi.peer } ] ] ... ... osgi > ZooDiscovery > Discovery Service Deactivated.Feb , 3:57:27 PM . well , log4j initialization n't seem configured ... i.e . log4j : WARN appenders could found logger ( org.apache.zookeeper.server.ZooKeeperServer ) . log4j : WARN Please initialize log4j system properly . Would possible turn ZooDiscovery startup , publish , shutdown output ? desired , ECF trivial OSGi LogService implementation ( SystemLogService ) ... well LogHelper classes others use . One example usage : http : //git.eclipse.org/c/ecf/org.eclipse.ecf.git/tree/osgi/bundles/org.eclipse.ecf.osgi.services.remoteserviceadmin/src/org/eclipse/ecf/internal/osgi/services/remoteserviceadmin/Activator.java 'm saying LogService used addressing bug , available use additional code cost without additional dependencies . Note also ECF util Trace class also used ( tracing/debug output ) .

bug_description: According TCK spec ( 122.7.7 p. ) , RSA set event properties following keys : bundle , bundle.symbolicname , bundle.id , bundle.version

reformed_query: JREs Time JREPreference findVMInstall IVMInstall Type Project correctly Rename couple
bug_title: Conflits during JRE's import are not solved correctly.
bug_description: Project org.eclipse.jdt.launching , idea component : Reproduction steps : . Add couple JREs preferences ( ok ) . . Export 'Installed JRE ' preferences . Rename JREs ( add f.e . _2 ) . Export 'Installed JRE 's . . Delete JREs except default one . . Import files . . Repeat steps 5-6 necessary . usually works second time . Result : JRE 's displayed ( typically one missing ) . see something like default java_1 java_1_2 java_2 instead default java_1 java_1_2 java_2 java_2_2 . Cause : JREPreferenceModifyListener , lines 85-89 long unique = System.currentTimeMillis ( ) ; IVMInstallType vmType = vm.getVMInstallType ( ) ; ( vmType.findVMInstall ( String.valueOf ( unique ) ) ! = null ) { unique++ ; } vm = new VMStandin ( vm , String.valueOf ( unique ) ) ; code replaces conflicting id new one generated system time basis . problem loop never entered , vmType aware already existing ids , newly created ones . second conflict met system time changes , duplicated id added . Therefore see missing vms .

reformed_query: memory loop endless Process process Exit tutorial altough thread Runtime
bug_title: RuntimeProcess should synchronize access to fTerminated and fExitValue
bug_description: Access fTerminated fExitValue need synchronized . following example leads endless loop . Thread : ( ! process.isTerminated ( ) ) { } Thread : process.terminate ( ) ; Despite termination clearly executed , process ACTUALLY killed , fTerminated Thread always return false . Comment user : curious wrong could n't keep back . decided learn develope JBossTools . installing , studying debuging find wrong . problem threading , precisely Memory Consistency Errors ( look http : //java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/concurrency/memconsist.html ) . writing reading fTerminated variable RuntimeProcess class two different threads , memory consistency error happend . method stopProcess.isTerminated ( ) returnig false time altough ProcessMonitor thread already set fTerminated variable true . solution synchronize reading writing fTerminated variable actually eclipse bug .

reformed_query: Libraries jvm setting failed Build Properties jar Actual failed bin
bug_title: [jre] "JRE System Library" default not used properly after Java update (also with symbolic links)
bug_description: Build ID : M20080911-1700 Steps Reproduce : . Updated Sun Java 1.6.0-u7 1.6.0-u11 via SuSE 's updater . . /usr/bin/java - > /etc/alternatives/java - > /usr/lib/jvm/jre-1.6.0.u11-sun/bin/java , similar /usr/lib/jvm/ * ( SuSE automatically updated system Java points ) . Restarted computer Eclipse . Opened workspace . Projects failed ( see Actual result ) . Package Explorer | myproject | context menu | Properties | Java Build Path | Libraries shows " JRE System Library [ java-1.6.0.u11-sun-1.6.0.u11 ] " , correct : new existing Java . . looked everywhere could find , Project settings Window | Preferences , could n't see u7 referenced . Actual result : Description Resource Path Location Type Project 'myproject ' missing required library : '/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.6.0.u7-sun-1.6.0.u7/jre/lib/resources.jar' myproject Build path Build Path Problem Expected result : Uses new Java version . Workaround : Package Explorer | myproject | context menu | Properties | Java Build Path | Libraries , double-click " JRE System Library [ java-1.6.0.u11-sun-1.6.0.u11 ] " . dialog comes , saying " ( * ) Workspace default JRE ( java-1.6.0.u11-sun-1.6.0.u11 ) " . Instead , check " ( ) Alternate JRE [ java-1.6.0.u11-sun-1.6.0.u11 ] " click " Finish " button . Error goes away . Go dialog check " Workspace default JRE " . error goes come back , although 's setting error appeared . confirms 's Eclipse bug . information :

bug_title: JavaRuntime computeVMInstall method returns the first VM instead of the workspace default VM if no compatible VM version is found for the given launch configuration
bug_description: Build Identifier : 3.7.1 JavaRuntime computeVMInstall ( ILaunchConfiguration ) method returns first VM { workspace } \.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.core.runtime\.settings\org.eclipse.jdt.launching.prefs instead workspace default VM compatible VM version found given launch configuration . may seem serious issue creates lot confusion user . behaviour noticed/discovered using maven m2e eclipse plugin . IMHO JavaRuntime computeVMInstall ( ILaunchConfiguration ) return workspace default JVM first VM preference file . JREContainerInitializer : public static IVMInstall resolveVM ( IExecutionEnvironment environment ) method modified returns default workspace VM . public static IVMInstall resolveVM ( IExecutionEnvironment environment ) { ( JREContainer.DEBUG_JRE_CONTAINER ) { System.out.println ( " < JRE_CONTAINER > resolveVM ( IExecutionEnvironment ) " ) ; // $ NON-NLS-1 $ } IVMInstall vm = environment.getDefaultVM ( ) ; ( vm == null ) { IVMInstall [ ] installs = environment.getCompatibleVMs ( ) ; // take first strictly compatible vm default ( installs.length == & & JREContainer.DEBUG_JRE_CONTAINER ) { System.out.println ( " \t * * * COMPATIBLE VMS * * * " ) ; // $ NON-NLS-1 $ } ( int = ; < installs.length ; i++ ) { IVMInstall install = installs [ ] ; ( environment.isStrictlyCompatible ( install ) ) { vm = install ; ( installs.length == & & JREContainer.DEBUG_JRE_CONTAINER ) { System.out.println ( " \tPerfect Match : " + vm.getName ( ) ) ; // $ NON-NLS-1 $ } break ; } } // use first vm failing ( vm == null & & installs.length > ) { vm= JavaRuntime.getDefaultVMInstall ( ) ; ( installs.length == & & JREContainer.DEBUG_JRE_CONTAINER ) { System.out.println ( " \tFirst Match : " + vm.getName ( ) ) ; // $ NON-NLS-1 $ } } } else { ( JREContainer.DEBUG_JRE_CONTAINER ) { System.out.println ( " \tUser Default VM : " + vm.getName ( ) ) ; // $ NON-NLS-1 $ } } return vm ; } Reproducible : Always Steps Reproduce : instructions example behaviour causes confusion maven . behaviour nothing m2e plugin ! . two JVM 's installed JRE JDK 1.6 . . Eclipse starts discovers JRE automatically adds default JRE workspace . . add JDK 1.6 VM preferences made workspace default VM . . create project using m2e plugin execution environment project set J2SE 1.5 . 5.When compile project using maven install first time . works . 6.Now run maven clean 7.Now try run maven install . Maven complains JDK installed . user already added JDK VM preferences set workspace default creates lot confusion .

Resizing shell less would really improve perfomance platforms .

However pose issue working IDE 's complain use raw parameterized class . following snippet illustrates difference : public class Foo < > { //This unchecked assignment //and suppressed using " unchecked " //This appear warning javac Foo < > [ ] = new Foo [ ] ; //This raw use paramterized type //Not suppressed javac using " unchecked " //This appear warning javac Foo [ ] b = new Foo [ ] ; } workaround declare b wildcard , e.g . : Foo < ? > [ ] b = new Foo [ ] ; Reproducible : Always

Result : package p ; import p.C.I1 ; // BUG public class C { protected class I1 { protected void foo ( ) { } } protected class I2 extends I1 { } void test ( I1 ) { i.foo ( ) ; } } bug seems originate fact SuperTypeRefactoringProcessor.createCorrespondingNode ( CompilationUnitRewrite , TType ) calls ImportRewrite.addImportFromSignature ( String , AST ) proper ImportRewriteContext .

reformed_query: Category headers Plug tool find Manifest OSGi project INF
bug_title: PDE Tools > Organize Manifest... incorrectly identifes an externalized Bundle-Category value as unused
bug_description: Using 3.3 M5 PDE Tools > Organize Manifest ... tool incorrectly identifes externalized Bundle-Category value unused , consequently removes properties file . expected behavior . Steps Reproduce : . Create Plug-in Project . . Open project 's META-INF/MANIFEST.MF . Add follow OSGi headers : Bundle-Localization : plugin Bundle-Category : % category . necessary , add plugin.properties file root project . . Add following property plugin.properties file : category=Test . Select project Package Explorer , organize manifest choosing PDE Tools > Organize Manifest ... context menu . . Check checkbox labeled " Remove unused keys plug-in 's properties file " click " Finish " button . . Go plugin.properties file find category propery removed .

reformed_query: Illegal attribute Warning xml valid spec separated Syntax servlet
bug_title: PDE-Warning for illegal characters in feature.xml (complains about "-" chars)
bug_description: Steps reproduce : Add following lines feature.xml : < plugin id= " org.springframework.osgi.servlet-api.osgi " download-size= " " install-size= " " version= " 0.0.0 " unpack= " false " / > PDE-Tools display warning invalid token " - " : Illegal value 'org.springframework.osgi.servlet-api.osgi ' attribute 'id ' . Legal token characters " a-z " , " A-Z " , " 0-9 " , " _ " . Tokens must separated " . " According OSGi spec , " - " " _ " valid characters bundle symbolic name ( chapter 1.3.2 General Syntax Definitions ) .

[ ... ] default mode JSP pages Web Application delivered using web.xml using Servlet 2.3 earlier format ignore EL expressions ; provides backward compatibility . -- - However , even deactivated EL expression evaluation , jsp code like : < % @ page isELIgnored= " true " % > $ { < % = " Hello , world ! " % > } produce output like : $ { < % = " Hello , world ! " % > } course backwards-compatible Servlet 2.3 / JSP 1.2 container ( e.g. , Tomcat 4.x ) , output would : $ { Hello , world ! } $ { ... } syntax widely used , pre-2.0 jsp pages would incompatible Tomcat 5.x even though standard tries ensure compatibility .

bug_title: Matching of relevant servlet filters fails when request is forwarded...
bug_description: ran situation Tomcat execute appropriate filters request forwarded . 'm using handy URLRewriteFilter implementation ( tuckey.org ) . forwarded request internally , filters matching url-pattern ( web.xml file ) dispatcher setting REQUEST FORWARD invoked . tracing code ( hours later ) , found problem lies inside ApplicationDispatcher code . set DISPATCHER_REQUEST_PATH_ATTR state attribue servletPath . meant matches using servlet path would match , longer ( exact ) urls would fail match . example , using following filter mapping : < filter-mapping > < filter-name > my-filter < /filter-name > < url-pattern > /app/level/mycode.do < /url-pattern > < dispatcher > REQUEST < /dispatcher > < dispatcher > FORWARD < /dispatcher > < /filter-mapping > would match request forwarded /app/level/mycode.do , ! Changing url pattern " /app/ * " would match , " /app/level/ * " would , since servletPath /app example . fix quite simple . ApplicationDispatcher.java code , method processRequest ( ) ( called forwards ) , change following statement : state.outerRequest.setAttribute ( ApplicationFilterFactory.DISPATCHER_REQUEST_PATH_ATTR , servletPath ) ; use requestURI instead follows : state.outerRequest.setAttribute ( ApplicationFilterFactory.DISPATCHER_REQUEST_PATH_ATTR , requestURI ) ; resolves problem let examples correctly match run filter forward . believe includes also broken manner . Similar changes doInclude ( ) method ApplicationDispatcher.java likely resolve issue well , though tested personally . nice see resolved 6.0.17+ . Thanks ! .... Andrzej

bug_title: The annotation doesn't become effective.(metadata-complete="false" is not effective.)
bug_description: Even " false " set metadata-complete , annotation n't become effective . invalidate annotation Web applications Tomcat , metadata-complete conf/web.xml set " true " . [ conf/web.xml ] < web-app xmlns= " http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee " xmlns : xsi= " http : //www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance " xsi : schemaLocation= " http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_2_5.xsd " version= " 2.5 " metadata-complete= " true " > ..... < /web-app > make annotation Web application ( testWebApp ) effective , metadata-complete webapps/testWebApp/WEB-INF/web.xml set " false " . [ webapps/testWebApp/WEB-INF/web.xml ] < web-app xmlns= " http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee " xmlns : xsi= " http : //www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance " xsi : schemaLocation= " http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http : //java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_2_5.xsd " version= " 2.5 " metadata-complete= " false " > .... < /web-app > However , testWebApp n't make annotation effective . bug_title: PersistentManager (using filestore) can return different session objects linked to the same session ID, when Tomcat is restarted
bug_description: Created attachment [ details ] Sample webapp scripts reproduce issue using PersistentManager filestore backing , 've noticed ( near ) simultaneous requests session ID , cause PersistentManager return two different session objects , shortly restarting Tomcat . included sample webapp , test script create simultaneous HTTP requests servlet , reproduces issue . General steps reproduce : . Configure PersistentManager use FileStore . < Manager className= " org.apache.catalina.session.PersistentManager " > < Store className= " org.apache.catalina.session.FileStore " directory= " /tmp " > < /Store > < /Manager > . Make HTTP request servlet , establish new session . Note new session ID created server . . Restart Tomcat ( cleanly shutdown startup ) . . Shortly Tomcat starts initialises , make near simultaneous HTTP requests servlet using previously established session cookie . . Output session IDs session object hashcodes server side , associated request . . reported session object hashcodes different ( even though session IDs ) . Additionally HttpSessionListener report additional sessions created/destroyed . Expected results : Session object hashcodes requests ( session ID ) . Notes included attachment : - sessionTest.zip contains sample webapp two servlets . LoginServlet establishes new session request . TestServlet use session cookie attached request , retrieve session object ( printing ID hex-encoded object hashcode ) . SessionListener log time session created destroyed . - session_test.sh script automatically start/shutdown Tomcat , make HTTP requests using curl . may change location TOMCAT_HOME , URL deployed webapp , COOKIE path . - Using sample webapp script always reproduce issue . may take goes reproduce . Example output : [ tomcat @ localhost sessionTest ] $ ./session_test.sh Starting Tomcat .. Logging init new session .. New sessiond ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A New session obj hashcode : 3e5e9db7 -- - Shutting Tomcat .. Starting Tomcat .. Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 46bb05de -- - Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 46bb05de -- - Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 68acbd3a -- - Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 46bb05de -- - Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 24bb6086 -- - Session ID : JSESSIONID=09DDD0198C190E3394C19808DD8E074A Session obj hashcode : 24bb6086 -- - Removing cookie /tmp/foo.cookie Shutting Tomcat .. Notice three different session objects tied session ID , requests made ( hashcodes : 46bb05de , 68acbd3a , 24bb6086 ) .

bug_title: Blank page (dropped connection) when running TC7 with TCnative (APR)
bug_description: encountered trying run current TC trunk TC-Native 1.1.19 Windows . root cause behavior occurred wrong value configured default timeout AprEndpoint.Poller . ( Also might issue timeout applied / Poller works , debatable ) . Current 6.0 5.5 ( 6.0.24 , 5.5.28 ) unaffected , defaults different . Though looks like 6.0 configured misbehave way . details . accessing Tomcat HTTP ( using Http11AprProtocol ) , think AJP ( AjpAprProtocol ) affected well . Tomcat build trunk ( aka future TC7 ) , revision . ~ Symptoms ~ reproduce issue : . environment : - Windows XP 32-bit - java version " 1.6.0_17 " Java ( TM ) SE Runtime Environment ( build 1.6.0_17-b04 ) Java HotSpot ( TM ) Client VM ( build 14.3-b01 , mixed mode , sharing ) - Tomcat trunk , built revision - Tomcat Native DLL 1.1.19 . Place tcnative-1.dll % CATALINA_HOME % /bin start Tomcat . using HTTP client , AJP connector configuration removed server.xml . Tomcat starts : 31.01.2010 18:45:16 org.apache.catalina.core.AprLifecycleListener init INFO : Loaded APR based Apache Tomcat Native library 1.1.19 . 31.01.2010 18:45:16 org.apache.catalina.core.AprLifecycleListener init INFO : APR capabilities : IPv6 [ true ] , sendfile [ true ] , accept filters [ false ] , random [ true ] . . bug_description: Hi , believe 've found race condition Tomcat causes http port non-responsive . exists 6.0 also 5.5 ( although code refactored ) . could find reference Bug database mailing list archives . Consider tomcat instance maxThreads set , i.e . tomcat threads service incoming requests . sequence events follows : . Thread Thread servicing request . . third request comes . . class JIOEndpoint.java , acceptor thread calls methods processSocket ( ) calls getWorkerThread ( ) calls createWorkerThread ( ) . 4. createWorkerThread ( ) returns null since threads busy processing two requests . . race condition method getWorkerThread ( ) code shown protected Worker getWorkerThread ( ) { ... Worker workerThread = createWorkerThread ( ) ; ( workerThread == null ) { try { synchronized ( workers ) { workers.wait ( ) ; } } ... } acceptor thread executes " ( workerThread == null ) " statement switched CPU . two threads executing two requests complete go Worker.await ( ) waiting next job executing method recycleWorkerThread ( ) . acceptor thread switched back CPU executes synchronized block goes wait ( ) . point , n't Worker threads processing requests therefore n't thread wake acceptor thread . application non-responsive . simple solution would check curThreadsBusy > synchronized block going wait ( ) method getWorkerThread ( ) increase scope critical section include loop . " fragment " merged web.xml web application , even < distributable/ > set web.xml , distributable changed true false . following necessary . annotations.setDistributable ( true ) ; Best regards .

( clusterName.indexOf ( " # " ) > =0 ) ) clusterName = host.getName ( ) + " # " + clusterName ; } } return clusterName ; } ==== method , clusterName.indexOf ( " # " ) > = checked . context name becomes contextName # # version web application version , name cluster manager n't become format " HostName # contextName " . result , Engine level Clustering n't work correctly . reformed_query: bugs Bad getClass Factory instance subclasses block programs Factory URLContext
bug_title: Bad use of getClass() could potentially lead to concurrency bugs in future
bug_description: method org.apache.naming.java.javaURLContextFactory.getInitialContext ( Hashtable < ? , ? > ) synchronized block getClass ( ) . Using getClass ( ) lock bug pattern class subclasses javaURLContextFactory getInitialContext gets called instance subclass , getClass ( ) return different Class object instance . Locking different objects different classes usually expected behavior . Therefore , suggest remove bug pattern simply replacing getClass ( ) javaURLContextFactory.class . See https : //www.securecoding.cert.org/confluence/display/java/LCK02-J.+Do+not+synchronize+on+the+class+object+returned+by+getClass % % information bug pattern . Keshmesh ( https : //github.com/reprogrammer/keshmesh/ ) Eclipse plugin analyzes source code Java programs detect concurrency bug patterns one reported .

reformed_query: changed ends Coyote findPendingRequest occurs Content Host checks thread Basic
bug_title: CometProcessor does not flush and close HTTP/1.0 requests
bug_description: built simple Publish/Subscribe servlet using CometProcessor . client connects servlet checks BEGIN phase whether pending events client stores request list pending requests . Later another thread notifies CometProcessor data user arrived data pushed pending connection . pseudo-code looks like : public class EventService implements CometProcessor { public void event ( CometEvent event ) { ( event.getType ( ) == CometEvent.BEGIN ) { String data = getDataForUser ( event ) ; ( data ! = null ) { sendAndClose ( data , event ) ; } else { pendingRequests.add ( event ) ; } } else { event.close ( ) ; } } public void push ( String user , String data ) { CometEvent event = findPendingRequest ( user ) ; sendAndClose ( data , event ) ; pendingRequests.remove ( event ) ; } public void sendAndClose ( String data , CometEvent event ) { Writer w = event.request.getWriter ( ) ; w.write ( data ) ; w.flush ( ) ; event.close ( ) ; } } works expected long connect HTTP/1.1 client . However , HTTP/1.0 client connects ( e.g . nginx ) connection closed immediately . case data JSON string pushed client client ends '\r\n ' connection lingers open . also reproducible curl HTTP/1.1 request -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- # curl -v -XGET -u 'frank : frank ' 'http : //127.0.0.1:8081/fcc/event ? timestamp=1297277309368 ' ; echo > GET /fcc/event ? timestamp=1297277309368 HTTP/1.1 > Authorization : Basic xxx > User-Agent : curl/7.21.2 ... > Host : 127.0.0.1:8081 > Accept : * / * > < HTTP/1.1 OK < Server : Apache-Coyote/1.1 < Content-Type : application/json ; charset=ISO-8859-1 < Transfer-Encoding : chunked < Date : Wed , Feb 18:49:45 GMT < { " type " : " settings-changed " , " timestamp " :1297277385366 , " data " : { " version " :157 } } * Connection # host 127.0.0.1 left intact * Closing connection # ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Connection closed immediately HTTP/1.0 request -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- # curl -v -XGET -0 -u 'frank : xxx ' 'http : //127.0.0.1:8081/fcc/event ? timestamp=1297277309368 ' ; echo > GET /fcc/event ? timestamp=1297277309368 HTTP/1.0 > Authorization : Basic xxx > User-Agent : curl/7.21.2 ... > Host : 127.0.0.1:8081 > Accept : * / * > < HTTP/1.1 OK < Server : Apache-Coyote/1.1 < Content-Type : application/json ; charset=ISO-8859-1 < Date : Wed , Feb 18:49:45 GMT < Connection : close < { " type " : " settings-changed " , " timestamp " :1297277385366 , " data " : { " version " :157 } } ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Connection stays open timeout occurs

bug_description: Created attachment [ details ] line causes doFlush stuck true gets exception First time opening bug , please forgive report n't perfect ! recently ran issue OutputBuffer 's doFlush gets stuck true . OutputBuffer.doFlush ( boolean ) sets doFlush = true , calls bb.flushBuffer , sets doFlush = false . issue ran bb.flushBuffer eventually calls OutputBuffer.realWriteBytes . realWriteBytes eventually calls coyoteResponse.doWrite . coyoteResponse.doWrite throws IOException , rethrows ClientAbortException . seeing client disconnecting early , causing doWrite throw SocketException " Broken pipe " . broken pipe causes ClientAbortException thrown . thrown , error bubbled doFlush stuck " true " . next time processor used , calls recycle ( ) method OutputBuffer . However , recycle n't reset doFlush still set true . imagine quite ways fix , two obvious ones come mind : - recycle ( ) set doFlush back false - throw finally try/catch/finally OutputBuffer.doFlush doFlush set back false Exception catch

reformed_query: investigation fire DeltaSessionManager Embedded Session methods methods investigation special equivalent
bug_title: org.apache.catalina.startup.Embedded overrides Lifecycle incorrectly?
bug_description: sure bug mis-coding ... 've using Embedded component Tomcat 6.0.29 integration testing . Something like : server = new EmbeddedTomcat ( " /test " , , " JVM-1 " ) ; PeerToPeerCacheLifecycleListener p2pListener = new PeerToPeerCacheLifecycleListener ( ) ; p2pListener.setProperty ( " mcast-port " , " " ) ; server.getEmbedded ( ) .addLifecycleListener ( p2pListener ) ; sessionManager = new DeltaSessionManager ( ) ; server.getRootContext ( ) .setManager ( sessionManager ) ; EmbeddedTomcat class simply wrapper Embedded - 'm passing context , port 'JVM route ' - nothing special . add listener programmatic equivalent following server.xml snippet : < Server > < Listener className= " PeerToPeerCacheLifecycleListener " / > < /Server > DeltaSessionManager performs custom session management thus extends ManagerBase implements Lifecycle SessionManager . start DeltaSessionManager initialize listener this.lifecycle.fireLifecycleEvent ( START_EVENT , null ) ; listener picks event starts . works nicely Tomcat , breaks Tomcat 7.0.12 . initial investigation shows LifecycleEvent , fired , reaching Embedded component listener registered . Removing overridden Lifecycle methods Embedded ( Lifecyle processing happens LifecycleBase ) seems work triggered event reaches listener .

bug_title: HTTP/SSL with NIO won't work
bug_description: Error reproduction conditions : Tomcat 7.0.20 . Connector= " ... Http11NioProtocol " SSLEnabled= " true " secure= " true " scheme= " https " clientAuth=true false JDK 1.6.0_27 X64 . operation systems . user connects https : // , SSL handshake fails error : javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException : cipher suites common connector settings , change BIO : Connector= " ... Http11Protocol " , everything works fine . problem cause differences SSL behavior BIO NIO handshake . 've found workaround : http : //bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do ? bug_id=6448723 See org.apache.tomcat.util.net.jsse.JSSESocketFactory . JSSEKeyManager wraps KeyManager . NIO mode , KeyManager two extra methods : public java.lang.String chooseEngineClientAlias ( java.lang.String [ ] keyType , java.security.Principal [ ] issuers , javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine engine ) ; public java.lang.String chooseEngineServerAlias ( java.lang.String keyType , java.security.Principal [ ] issuers , javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine engine ) ; use custom hand-made SSLInmplemention extra features : * Keypair storage hardware device database * ExtendedKeyUsage verification TrustManager * CRL validation CRL distribution point online synchronization * ActiveDirectory account lookup certificate complete source code workaround : package ru.yamoney.calypso.server.security.jsse ; import org.apache.tomcat.util.net.AbstractEndpoint ; import org.apache.tomcat.util.net.jsse.JSSESocketFactory ; import ru.yamoney.calypso.server.CommonKernel ; import javax.net.ssl . * ; import java.net.Socket ; import java.security.KeyStore ; import java.security.Principal ; import java.security.PrivateKey ; import java.security.cert.X509Certificate ; / * * * SSLImplementation Tomcat-7-NIO * * @ author Roman Tsirulnikov * / final class CalypsoSSLSocketFactory extends JSSESocketFactory { private final CalypsoKeyManager keyManager ; private final X509TrustManager trustManager ; public CalypsoSSLSocketFactory ( AbstractEndpoint endpoint ) { super ( endpoint ) ; keyManager = CommonKernel.getInstance ( ) .getBean ( " server_calypsoKeyManager " ) ; trustManager = CommonKernel.getInstance ( ) .getBean ( " server_calypsoTrustManager " ) ; } @ Override public KeyManager [ ] getKeyManagers ( ) { try { KeyStore ks = keyManager.getKeyStore ( ) ; ( ! ks.isKeyEntry ( keyManager.getKeyAlias ( ) ) ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " Keystore entry private keypair : " + keyManager.getKeyAlias ( ) ) ; } KeyManagerFactory kmf = KeyManagerFactory.getInstance ( KeyManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm ( ) ) ; kmf.init ( ks , keyManager.getKeystorePass ( ) .toCharArray ( ) ) ; KeyManager [ ] kms = kmf.getKeyManagers ( ) ; ( int = ; < kms.length ; i++ ) { kms [ ] = new NIOKeyManagerWrapper ( ( X509KeyManager ) kms [ ] , keyManager.getKeyAlias ( ) ) ; } return kms ; } catch ( Exception e ) { throw new IllegalArgumentException ( " SSLSocketFactory init : " + e.getMessage ( ) , e ) ; } } @ Override public TrustManager [ ] getTrustManagers ( ) { return new TrustManager [ ] { trustManager } ; } / * * * X509KeyManager wrapper * Workaround SSL-NIO engine bug http : //bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do ? bug_id=6448723 * / private final class NIOKeyManagerWrapper extends X509ExtendedKeyManager { private X509KeyManager delegate ; private String serverKeyAlias ; / * * * Constructor . * * @ param mgr X509KeyManager used delegate * @ param serverKeyAlias alias name server 's keypair * supporting certificate chain * / NIOKeyManagerWrapper ( X509KeyManager mgr , String serverKeyAlias ) { super ( ) ; this.delegate = mgr ; this.serverKeyAlias = serverKeyAlias ; } / * * * Choose alias authenticate client side secure socket , * given public key type list certificate issuer authorities * recognized peer ( ) . * * @ param keyType key algorithm type name ( ) , ordered * most-preferred key type first * @ param issuers list acceptable CA issuer subject names , null * matter issuers used * @ param socket socket used connection . parameter * null , case method return generic * alias use * @ return alias name desired key , null * matches * / @ Override public String chooseClientAlias ( String [ ] keyType , Principal [ ] issuers , Socket socket ) { return delegate.chooseClientAlias ( keyType , issuers , socket ) ; } / * * * Returns key manager 's server key alias provided * constructor . * * @ param keyType key algorithm type name ( ignored ) * @ param issuers list acceptable CA issuer subject names , null * matter issuers used ( ignored ) * @ param socket socket used connection . parameter * null , case method return generic * alias use ( ignored ) * @ return Alias name desired key * / @ Override public String chooseServerAlias ( String keyType , Principal [ ] issuers , Socket socket ) { return serverKeyAlias ; ' , '/ ' ) + " .class " ; ( log.isDebugEnabled ( ) ) log.debug ( " Checking " + name ) ; JarEntry jarEntry = jarFile.getJarEntry ( name ) ; ( jarEntry ! = null ) { log.info ( " validateJarFile ( " + jarfile + " ) - jar loaded . bug_description: reproduce : Tomcat NIO connector , using HTTPS scheme , client requests quite big ( ~100K-200K ) static file , breaks connection unexpectedly . python script reproduce problem : # way reproduce bug Tomcat NIO connector . # Install python-iptables https : //github.com/ldx/python-iptables/downloads # Author : Dmitry Kukushkin ( dmitry.kukushkin external.telekom.de ) threading import Thread threading import Lock socket import * select import * time import * traceback import * import ssl import sys import iptc blockedPorts = dict ( ) getCssRequest = " " " GET / < big file > HTTP/1.1\r Host : < host > : < port > \r User-Agent : Mozilla/5.0 ( iPhone ; CPU iPhone OS 5_0_1 like Mac OS X ) AppleWebKit/534.46 ( KHTML , like Gecko ) Mobile/9A406\r Accept : text/css , * / * ; q=0.1\r Accept-Language : de-de\r Accept-Encoding : gzip , deflate\r Connection : keep-alive\r\n \r\n " " " class Client ( Thread ) : def __init__ ( self , tid , lock ) : Thread.__init__ ( self ) self.lock = lock self.tid = tid def run ( self ) : print " Starting thread % " % self.tid try : clientSocket = socket ( AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM ) sslSocket = ssl.wrap_socket ( clientSocket ) remoteAddr = ( < host > , < port > ) sslSocket.connect ( remoteAddr ) localAddr , localPort = sslSocket.getsockname ( ) print " New socket created tid= % , sfd= % , sport= % " % ( self.tid , clientSocket.fileno ( ) , localPort ) self.deleteFirewallRule ( localPort , self.lock ) sslSocket.send ( getCssRequest ) data = sslSocket.recv ( ) " ' Put socket half - closed state " ' clientSocket.shutdown ( SHUT_WR ) clientSocket.close ( ) self.createFirewallRule ( localPort , self.lock ) except Exception , e : print " Error : " , e print_exc ( ) @ staticmethod def createFirewallRule ( port , lock ) : lock.acquire ( ) print " Creating iptables rule port % " % port rule = iptc.Rule ( ) rule.protocol = " tcp " rule.target = iptc.Target ( rule , " REJECT " ) match = iptc.Match ( rule , " tcp " ) match.sport = " % " % port rule.add_match ( match ) chain = iptc.Chain ( iptc.TABLE_FILTER , " OUTPUT " ) chain.insert_rule ( rule ) rule.target.reset ( ) blockedPorts [ port ] = rule lock.release ( ) @ staticmethod def deleteFirewallRule ( port , lock ) : lock.acquire ( ) port blockedPorts : print " Deleteng iptables rule port % " % port rule = blockedPorts [ port ] chain = iptc.Chain ( iptc.TABLE_FILTER , " OUTPUT " ) chain.delete_rule ( rule ) chain.flush ( ) del blockedPorts [ port ] lock.release ( ) __name__ == " __main__ " : len ( sys.argv ) == : print " Problem.py < number threads > " exit ( ) clients = [ ] lock = Lock ( ) range ( int ( sys.argv [ ] ) ) : c = Client ( , lock ) clients.append ( c ) c.start ( ) print " Joining " clients : i.join ( ) client shutdowns socket , thus making connection half-closed , disappears ( blocked firewall case script ) . results high CPU load : Servers polls socket descriptor reading writing , gets EPOLLIN event half-closed connection , trying write , failing EAGAIN , polling sd writing reading events , getting EPOLLIN , trying write ... , see attached strace snippet : ... Weld 's recurse function assuming correct ... protected static void recurse ( DirContext context , Set < String > classes , Set < URL > urls , String prefix ) throws Exception { ( prefix.length ( ) > ) prefix += " . bug_title: ReplicatedMap don't like TcpFailureDetector in static configuration
bug_description: Tribes stack using : * TcpPingInterceptor * TcpFailureDetector * MessageDispatchInterceptor * StaticMembershipInterceptor work well static cluster . First side ( ie one thread ) : * call TcpFailureDetector.heartbeat ( ) * call checkMembers ( false ) * call performBasicCheck ( ) synchronized ( membership ) * performBasicCheck , missing static node : * add " missing " member membership membership.memberAlive ( ) * SECOND THREAD TIME WORK * check memberAlive ( ) * remove since n't exist Second side ( ie another thread ) : * call channel.getMembers ( ) like done AbstractReplicatedMap * call call TcpFailureDetector.getMembers ( ) * one could return wrong value since contains unavailable nodes Note : * synchronize membership n't use TcpFailureDetector getMember ( ) , getMembers ( ) , hasMembers ( ) , neither Membership equivalent method ( maybe 's heavy lock every thread TcpFailureDetector check node alive ) . must issue AbstractReplicatedMap since without TcpFailureDetector node could disapear replicated map try use . ReplicatedMap use always Channel.SEND_OPTIONS_DEFAULT value Channel.SEND_OPTIONS_USE_ACK . message sent missing node fail exception . Personnaly override TcpFailureDetector.heartbeat ( ) avoid performBasicCheck ( ) use static configuration ( TcpPingInterceptor call performForcedCheck ( ) ) . n't fix ReplicatedMap issue . Better fix could avoid adding missing member membership list : * Add method like memberAlive ( MemberImpl ) Membership without side effect ( add member ) * TcpFailureDetector.performBasicCheck ( ) : check new method adding node n't fix AbstractReplicatedMap issue work always acknoledge nodes . code Tomcat 6. best regards F.Arnoud

bug_title: Tomcat SPNEGO authenticator incompatible with IBM JDK: Accept Security Context needs to be wrapped around a Privileged Action in order for server side authentication
bug_description: Created attachment [ details ] Contains GNU unified diff SpnegoAuthenticator modified format Hi Problem report : - bug report , change made system property javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly longer set false . naturally follows GSSAPI AcceptSecContext method wrapped PrivilegedExceptionAction . found IBM JDK fails otherwise . Cause failure : - IBM JDK tries fetch credential GSSAPI AcceptSecContext method , JAAS Subject . Since call performed Subject.doAs , call fails IBM JDK access JAAS subject fetch credential . Please find attached : - . File containing gnu unified diff format SpnegoAuthenticator modified version . PLEASE NOTE DIFF TOP BUG FIX REPORTED . file also contains AcceptAction class wraps GSSAPI AcceptSecContext PrivilegedExceptionAction . fix solves issue allowing IBM JDK fetch credential JAAS Subject . sincerely Arunav Sanyal

bug_title: Correct display of outdated sessions in sessions count listing in Manager application
bug_description: minor issue , reported : r1614165 , http : //markmail.org/message/4iplahbcanujbqoo Manager application commands display distribution sessions according idle time . ( commands " /text/sessions " , " /text/expire " Test GUI " Expire Sessions " button HTML GUI . ) commands display many sessions idle time < minute , minutes ( - < ) , ( - < ) . Lets assume web application configured session-timeout minutes . r1614165 ( 7.0.56 ) /r1614163 ( 8.0.11 ) last time slot statistics labeled " > = " . revisions fixed labeled " - < " . Actually labeled " > = " , sessions idle time minutes actually added value , else ( time > = maxCount ) timeout [ maxCount-1 ] ++ ; would better count outdated sessions separate time slot , " - < " " > =30 " two distinct numbers . One may see " > =30 " sessions thread performs expiration run yet ( stuck ) . incorrect configuration test behaviour : . Configure examples application following text web.xml < session-config > < session-timeout > < /session-timeout > < /session-config > following META-INF/context.xml < Context backgroundProcessorDelay= " " / > . Configure user roles manager-script manager-gui . Start Tomcat . . Visit example webapp - > Servlet examples - > Session example create session . . Visit http : //localhost:8080/manager/html , click sessions number row examples webapp . list sessions opens . Use check idle time session . . Visit http : //localhost:8080/manager/text/sessions ? path=/examples see sessions statistics . . Wait minutes . Expected output /text/sessions command session idle minutes . Actual output " - < minutes : sessions "

reformed_query: receives event responses NioConnector NioChannel thread Processor Configuration adds read
bug_title: NioConnector caches get corrupted on concurrent comet close
bug_description: Configuration : Tomcat 7.0.47 NioConnector , nginx 1.6.2 , atmosphere 2.2.3 . happens nginx atmosphere close comet connection concurrently . NioEndpoint.Poller thread ( ) SocketChannel becomes ready read nginx closes . Poller unregisters channel read forks another thread ( B ) handle close event . ( see NioEndpoint:1239 ) atmosphere calls close connection thread ( C ) Tomcat receives internal action code ActionCode.COMET_CLOSE adds channel Poller , registers read . ( see Http11NioProcessor.java:462 ) . SocketChannel still readable case thread ( B ) hasnâ€™t invalidated SelectionKey yet , Poller thread ( ) initiates closing process forks thread ( ) . Thread ( B ) completes closing process puts NioChannel AttachmentKey corresponding caches . Thread ( ) tries close channel realizes already closed ( see AbstractProtocol.java:564 ) puts NioChannel AttachmentKey caches . Caches become corrupted contain references object . subsequent requests may get NioChannel AttachmentKey crazy stuff may happen ( mixed responses , etc ) .

bug_title: Incorrect use of standard SSL properties for JMX in JMXRemoteLifecycleListener
bug_description: ticket references older bugs changes related : - https : //issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi ? id=55017 - Ability provide RMI bind address ( RMI server selectively bound loopback ) - https : //issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi ? id=56039 - symptom problem , fixed works fine . problem : standard JMX properties ( http : //docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/management/agent.html , http : //docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/management/agent.html # gdevf ) different enabling SSL/TLS RMI registry ( jmxrmi registered ) JMX RMI server ( carries JMX operations ) , com.sun.management.jmxremote.registry.ssl com.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl respectively . done , RMI server factories thus created used creating RMI registry ( http : //svn.apache.org/viewvc/tomcat/trunk/java/org/apache/catalina/mbeans/JmxRemoteLifecycleListener.java ? revision=1498340 & view=markup , line number ) works fine long using SSL guess one reasons Alexey Noskov said " rmiBindAddress incompatible rmiSSL " . side effect noticed bug # fixed allow RMI registry clients use com.sun.jndi.rmi.factory.socket . Recommendation : Would possible separate RMIServerSocketFactory JMX/RMI RMI registry , one dictated com.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl ( results rmiSSL flag ) com.sun.management.jmxremote.registry.ssl . way agent compliant 'd still ability leave RMI registry non SSL ( get JMX/RMI connection stub ) . also fix " rmiBindAddress incompatible rmiSSL " problem creating custom SslRMIServerSocketFactory ( basically extending one JDK re-implementing createServerSocket method use given rmiBindAddress . 'd happy changes , provide changed version file , request seems reasonable . May patch well learn SVN quickly . PS : whole reason reached products use custom JMX authentication SSL/TLS implementation . implement jmx.remote.protocol.provider.pkgs approach inject SSL factories JMXConnnectorServer . recently broke control server socket RMI registry created . ended setting com.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl false avoid JMXRemoteLifecycleListener stop SSL anywhere .

See // https : //issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi ? id=57091 - return AccessController.doPrivileged ( new PrivilegedAction < Thread > ( ) { - @ Override - public Thread run ( ) { - Thread = new Thread ( r ) ; - t.setName ( " WebSocketClient-AsyncIO- " + count.incrementAndGet ( ) ) ; - t.setContextClassLoader ( this.getClass ( ) .getClassLoader ( ) ) ; - t.setDaemon ( true ) ; - return ; - } - } ) ; + return AccessController.doPrivileged ( new NewThreadPrivilegedAction ( r ) ) ; } + + // Non-anonymous class due class loading hack + private class NewThreadPrivilegedAction implements PrivilegedAction < Thread > { + + private final Runnable r ; + + public NewThreadPrivilegedAction ( Runnable r ) { + this.r = r ; + } + + @ Override + public Thread run ( ) { + Thread = new Thread ( r ) ; + t.setName ( " WebSocketClient-AsyncIO- " + count.incrementAndGet ( ) ) ; + t.setContextClassLoader ( this.getClass ( ) .getClassLoader ( ) ) ; + t.setDaemon ( true ) ; + return ; + } + } + + // Load privileged action class initialization , since newThread + // allowed load called InnocuousThread , see + // https : //issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi ? id=XXXXX + @ SuppressWarnings ( " unused " ) + private static final Class newThreadPrivilegedActionClass = NewThreadPrivilegedAction.class ; } } applied patch Tomcat 8.0.17 , repeat worked without exception . -d sample ] ; exit ; fi done sleep , tomcat guaranteed unpack war ( running default 10s detect audodeployment files ) . however script usually fails one times sufficiently large war file ( download time > 5s ) . cases last autodeployment attempt logs invalid zip , subsequent autodeployment , timestamp completed ( valid ) download identical log timestamp failed autodeployment , least one-second resolution ( common filesystems ) . suspect happening , example : 00:00:00.100 sample.war partially written 00:00:00.200 autodeployment attempted , fails 00:00:00.300 sample.war completely written 00:00:10.200 subsequent autodeployment cycle attempt re-deployment suspect time 00:00:00.200 , deployment fails , records " last update " timestamp . seconds later checks timestamp file disk , 00:00:00 ( note milliseconds ) later " last update " timestamp incorrectly skips redeployment . could probably also result following situation 00:00:00.100 sample.war v1 written 00:00:00.200 autodeployment done 00:00:00.300 sample.war v2 written 00:00:10.200 subsequent autodeployment cycle attempt re-deployment v1 deployed even though v2 subsequently written . suggest autodeployment wait files stabilise , i.e . skipping file updated within 1s window immediately prior autodeployment ( ensuring picked next autodeployment cycle , unless still changed ) . workarounds : * download tmp directory atomically ` mv ` file webapps directory upon completion * use manager webapp instead autodeployment would nice fix autodeployment works advertised ( think fix sketched fairly straightforward ) .

reformed_query: signed heap test heap occur Loader WebappClassLoader instances WebappClassLoader elapsed
bug_title: Memory Leak in WebappClassLoader
bug_description: Memory leak occur reference entry.manifest never removed . Problem : - $ { class } .class.getResource ( $ { resource.name1 } ) ; - JarFile load manifest . 3- resourceEntries put new ResourceEntry manifest reference . - $ { class } .class.getResource ( $ { resource.name2 } ) ; - resourceEntries put new ResourceEntry manifest reference . Manifest contains ~20MB , , problem JarFile reference . words , one Manifest Heap space . - wait milliseconds . - $ { class } .class.getResource ( $ { resource.name3 } ) ; - WebappClassLoader.closeJARs time elapsed milliseconds load new JarFile instances . - JarFile load new manifest . - resourceEntries put new ResourceEntry new manifest reference . - wait milliseconds ... memory leak little time ( See resourceEntries.png ) . attachment , scenario simulate problem . PS . : jar file need signed accelerate leak , Manifest.entries ~5MB ( see manifests.png ) retained heap ( test case , , real app ~20MB ) . attached heap dump used test case ( heap.zip ) . Solution : Always release manifest reference . Workaround : public class WebappClassLoader extends org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader { @ Override public InputStream getResourceAsStream ( String name ) { InputStream = super.getResourceAsStream ( name ) ; ResourceEntry entry = resourceEntries.get ( name ) ; ( entry ! = null ) { // prevent memory leak entry.manifest = null ; entry.certificates = null ; } return ; } @ Override public URL getResource ( String name ) { URL url = super.getResource ( name ) ; ResourceEntry entry = resourceEntries.get ( name ) ; ( entry ! = null ) { // prevent memory leak entry.manifest = null ; entry.certificates = null ; } return url ; } }

bug_title: JSP Reloading Initialization Problem
bug_description: Created attachment [ details ] logs tomcat reloading bug . company uses custom inhouse tomcat library hotloading generated source tomcat runtime . custom classloader requires tomcat 's JSP engine perform reload , recognize newly generated classes . performing following code facilitate : Context context = this.getContext ( ) ; Wrapper jspWrapper = ( Wrapper ) context.findChild ( " jsp " ) ; // might jsps 're getting started . ( jspWrapper==null ) return ; jspWrapper.unload ( ) ; jspWrapper.load ( ) ; code works fine Tomcat . However , migrating custom classloader Tomcat , subsequent JSP page load fails attached stacktrace . investigated stack trace come conclusion , StandardWrapper.java line , although instance set null , field " instanceInitialized " still set true . means next call load recreate JspServlet , initialized correctly , thus causing error attached stacktrace . seen debugger indeed case JspServlet initialized properly . fix bug simply add line : instanceInitialized = false ; line StandardWrapper.java . successfully able work around bug code following hack : Context context = this.getContext ( ) ; Wrapper jspWrapper = ( Wrapper ) context.findChild ( " jsp " ) ; // might jsps 're getting started . ( jspWrapper==null ) return ; jspWrapper.unload ( ) ; // tomcat-catalina 8.0.29 // custom hack required fix bug StandardWrapper catalina sourcecode . custom field source reset back false // calling unload , underlying JspServlet ( instance ) get initialized properly upon calling load . // bug happens tomcat . AccessController.doPrivileged ( new PrivilegedAction < Boolean > ( ) { public Boolean run ( ) { try { Field field = ( ( StandardWrapper ) jspWrapper ) .getClass ( ) .getDeclaredField ( " instanceInitialized " ) ; field.setAccessible ( true ) ; field.setBoolean ( jspWrapper , false ) ; } catch ( NoSuchFieldException | SecurityException | IllegalArgumentException | IllegalAccessException e ) { throw new RuntimeException ( e ) ; } return Boolean.TRUE ; } } ) ; jspWrapper.load ( ) ; Although see far ideal .
